Document Assembly.text: It is unquestionably faster than starting a new document from scratch, but it is also much slower than incorporating document assembly technology into the process (more on this later).

Document Assembly.text: Assuming no further adjustments, the document is printed in final form.

Document Assembly.text: On the most basic level, document assembly is the use of software to quickly and accurately generate customized documents in Microsoft Word or Corel WordPerfect.

annotation.text: On the most basic level, document assembly is the use of software to quickly and accurately generate customized documents in Microsoft Word or Corel WordPerfect.

Document Assembly.text: In other words, document assembly adds significant functionality to your existing word processor.

annotation.text: In other words, document assembly adds significant functionality to your existing word processor.

Document Assembly.text: A primary example of such technology is document assembly (also known as document automation).

annotation.text: A primary example of such technology is document assembly (also known as document automation).

Document Assembly.text: The dominant player in document assembly software is HotDocs™.

annotation.text: The dominant player in document assembly software is HotDocs™.

Document Assembly.text: Further, document assembly software and commercial drafting systems are not mutually exclusive; and many lawyers use both tools.

annotation.text: Further, document assembly software and commercial drafting systems are not mutually exclusive; and many lawyers use both tools.

Document Assembly.text: There are pros and cons to creating your own document assembly system versus buying/subscribing to a commercial system which are beyond the scope of this article.

Document Assembly.text: By contrast, commercial drafting systems automate document generation, but they include the documents you will use.

Document Assembly.text: Document assembly software is a tool you can use to automate the documents your firm already uses.

annotation.text: Document assembly software is a tool you can use to automate the documents your firm already uses.

Document Assembly.text: By automating her document generation using HotDocs document assembly software, the time required fell to 1.5 hours while accuracy increased.

annotation.text: By automating her document generation using HotDocs document assembly software, the time required fell to 1.5 hours while accuracy increased.

Document Assembly.text: If you're looking for a way to improve your firm's efficiency and profitability, document assembly software and/or a commercial drafting system may be the perfect tools.

annotation.text: If you're looking for a way to improve your firm's efficiency and profitability, document assembly software and/or a commercial drafting system may be the perfect tools.
The legal landscape is changing.

Drafting Legal Documents.text: Unquestionably, the most common drafting method used by lawyers is to use old documents as the starting point for new ones.

annotation.text: Unquestionably, the most common drafting method used by lawyers is to use old documents as the starting point for new ones.

Drafting Legal Documents.text: Proponents typically argue that dictation is the most efficient way for lawyers to produce documents.

annotation.text: Proponents typically argue that dictation is the most efficient way for lawyers to produce documents.

Drafting Legal Documents.text: The lawyer dictates a document (often reading from existing printed documents), then gives the tape or voice file to the secretary who transcribes it, prints it and returns a draft to the lawyer.

annotation.text: The lawyer dictates a document (often reading from existing printed documents), then gives the tape or voice file to the secretary who transcribes it, prints it and returns a draft to the lawyer.

Drafting Legal Documents.text: The lawyer reviews the draft, marks it up and returns it to the secretary to enter the changes.

annotation.text: The lawyer reviews the draft, marks it up and returns it to the secretary to enter the changes.

Drafting Legal Documents.text: Automation of high volume legal documents has been an indispen sable process for increasing law firm productivity and maintaining profit margins in an era of intense competition.

annotation.text: Automation of high volume legal documents has been an indispen sable process for increasing law firm productivity and maintaining profit margins in an era of intense competition.

Drafting Legal Documents.text: Most lawyers have at some point tried to find the most efficient and accurate way to create documents.

annotation.text: Most lawyers have at some point tried to find the most efficient and accurate way to create documents.

Drafting Legal Documents.text: The ratio of support staff to lawyers is decreasing across the country as the legal industry tries to reduce payroll and become more efficient.

annotation.text: The ratio of support staff to lawyers is decreasing across the country as the legal industry tries to reduce payroll and become more efficient.
